Interface GeneralOperationService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GeneralOperation

    public interface GeneralOperationService
    Interface contains methods that are required to provide general operations in the application.
    Author:
    Andrey Kryshtapovich

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      User signIn(java.lang.String login, byte[] password)
      Method provides user authentication in the system.

    • Method Detail

      • signIn

        User signIn(java.lang.String login,
            byte[] password)
     throws ServiceException
        Method provides user authentication in the system.
        Parameters:
        login - user's login.
        password - user's password.
        Returns:
        User if the credentials are correct.
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if authentication fails.
